item.description:
Valley 9/11 Truth will be meeting to plan a New England forum on a Saturday in March for the 9-11 truth movement and showing films. One of the ways we can get beyond preaching to the choir is by having a state referendum vote to enact a new law establishing a Citizens 9/11 Commission to investigate the 9/11 events and aftermath. The people have the right to take the power away from a corrupt cover-up of what the hell is going on. Endless energy wars and the divide of the rich and poor.. and even worse is the current legislation like the  NDAA, attack on truth, freedom.. The concept of democracy for we the people will not given to us by the so-called representative (bought) government.

 

The two New England states most suited for such a referendum vote is Massachusetts and Maine. Maine should perhaps be the first New England state to successfully petition for a referendum vote in 2014. It all depends on if our movement has enough funds and volunteers to successfully petition the state. Even if the people vote against such a Citizens' 9/11 Commission campaign, that may inspire the next state to rise up.. and be counted. The main reason to pursue such a campaign is to reach beyond preaching to the choir. People must realize.. truth with a direction for direct democracy could work in many areas of a corrupt suicidal system that is devouring, killing species, biodiversity and anti-life itself.
